title: Add release notes for libsawtooth v0.3
1.1 Backport: Enable heartbeats for all zmq connections
Replace Permission Verifier in Rust code
body: This PR implements the PermissionVerifier in rust.  It is utilized during block validation currently, but could easily be inserted into the publisher for use in the candidate block.

title: Add info about the whitelist check in contributing
body:
Add a bullet point about the whitelist and how to get added to it.

Signed-off-by: Richard Berg <rberg@bitwise.io>

title: Ensure REST API works properly behind a Digest Auth proxy
body:
Created a new integration test to test the REST API behind a Digest Auth
Proxy. Added proxy container docker-compose file for Digest Auth Proxy
to mimic basic-auth-proxy in docker/compose/external.yaml

Resolves: #STL-512
Signed-off-by: nickylimjj <nickylimjj.nl@gmail.com>

title: Remove invalid batches from pending batches pool
body:
When a block publisher cancels a block, it will now sort out any
invalid batches from the candidate block and remove them from
the pending batch pool.

This included:
 -  Adding pub invalid_batches: Vec<Batch> field to CandidateBlock
 -  Moving injected batches only check to after batch sorting in
    CandidateBlock.summarize()
 -  Adding code to SyncBlockPublisher.cancel_block() to remove
    any invalid transactions recorded by the candidate block
    from state.pending_batches before canceling the block

title: Add license headers to files identified by the Fossology scan
body:
Detailed fossology report available in STL-398
